trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when authentication fails for an authentication stream and cannot be retried.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod under godkjenning mislykkes for godkjenning flyten og kan ikke kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> classes throw this exception when authentication fails.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>og <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>klasser throw dette unntaket når godkjenning mislykkes.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates that the underlying stream is not in a valid state and you cannot retry the authentication using the <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream> or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket indikerer at den underliggende er ikke i en gyldig tilstand, og du kan prøve på nytt godkjenning ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>eller <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> </xref:System.Net.Security.NegotiateStream>

trans-unit.source: If you can retry the authentication, an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException> is thrown instead of the InvalidCredentialException.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kan prøve på nytt godkjenning, en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>er et i stedet for InvalidCredentialException.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with no message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"> </xref> klasse ingen melding.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte meldingen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskapen med teksten i den `message` parameteren.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the authentication failure.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"> </xref> klassen fra den angitte forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>klasser.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to deserialize the new <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> forekomsten som inneholder informasjonen som kreves for deserialisering av det nye <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.InvalidCredentialException"> </xref> klassen med den angitte meldings- og indre unntaket.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property with the text in the `message` parameter and initializes the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property with the `innerException` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer den <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>egenskap med teksten i den `message` parameteren og initialisere den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskapen med den `innerException` parameterverdi.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the authentication failure.
The <xref:System.Exception> that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Exception>som er årsaken til den gjeldende unntaket.</xref:System.Exception>
